entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 5.
